attributes.action: stop making the UK into a vichy France style of government subject to the EU in the majority of legislation.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to

rejection.details:
There are already a number of similar petitions on the website which you may want to sign. 
http://petitions.number10.gov.uk/EUadmincosts/

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
